message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Given its high value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth, I'm offering it to you for $100. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, so don't hesitate to accept if you think it aligns with your expectations and budget.
